staging.description: produce results in the staging folder instead of production folder

unripe.description: visit unripe (not old enough and not yet staged or finalized) blocks

daemon.description: we are being called in daemon mode which causes us to print results differently

no_header.description: do not show the header row

start.description: first block to scan for appearances (inclusive)

end.description: end block to scan for appearances (inclusive)

list.description: Index transactions for a given Ethereum address (or series of addresses).

version.description: display the current version of the tool

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

veryRaw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

addr_list.description: one or more addresses (0x...) to export

articulate.description: articulate transactions, traces, logs, and outputs

logs.description: export logs instead of transaction list

traces.description: export traces instead of transaction list

balances.description: export balance history instead of transaction list

count_only.description: display only the count of the number of data items requested

blocks.description: write blocks to the binary cache ('off' by default)

writeTxs.description: write transactions to the binary cache ('on' by default)

writeTraces.description: write traces to the binary cache ('on' by default)

ddos.description: skip over dDos transactions in export ('on' by default)

maxTraces.description: if --ddos:on, the number of traces defining a dDos (default = 250)

no_header.description: do not show the header row

allABIs.description: load all previously cached abi files

grabABIs.description: using each trace's 'to' address, grab the abi for that address (improves articulation)

freshen.description: freshen but do not print the exported data

deltas.description: for --balances option only, export only changes in balances

export.description: Export full detail of transactions for one or more Ethereum addresses.

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

veryRaw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

nBlocks.description: maximum number of blocks to process (defaults to 5000)

nBlockProcs.description: number of block channels for blaze

nAddrProcs.description: number of address channels for blaze

scrape.description: Decentralized blockchain scraper and block cache.

list.description: display results in Linux ls -l format (assumes --detail)

config-get.description: returns JSON data of the editable configuration file items

config-set.description: accepts JSON in an env variable and writes it to configuration files

status.description: Report on status of one or more TrueBlocks caches.

version.description: display the current version of the tool

raw.description: report JSON data from the node with minimal processing

veryRaw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

command.description: which command to run, one of enum[list|export|slurp|accounts|abi|state|data|blocks|transactions|receipts|logs|traces|quotes|scrape|status|config|rm|message|leech|seed]

sleep.description: for the 'scrape' and 'daemon' commands, the number of seconds chifra should sleep between runs (default 0)

fn_list.description: path(s) of files to check, merge, fix or display (default=display)

check.description: check for duplicates and other problems in the cache

data.description: in 'list' mode, render results as data (i.e export mode)

sort.description: sort the list of transactions and re-write (precludes other modes, other than --dedup)

fix.description: remove duplicates from the cache (if any)

list.description: list the contents of the cache (the default if no other option)

import.description: import transactions if import.txt file exists in current folder

remove.description: remove transactions if remove.txt file exists in current folder

truncate.description: truncate the cache at block :n (keeps block 'n' and before, implies --fix)

maxBlock.description: for testing, max block to visit

merge.description: merge two or more caches into a single cache

start.description: un-used hidden value - do not remove

end.description: un-used hidden value - do not remove

no_header.description: do not show header row of data

className.description: one or more class definition files to process

namespce.description: surround the code with a namespace

run.description: run the class maker on associated <className(s)>

edit.description: edit <className(s)> definition file in local folder

all.description: edit, list, or run all class definitions found in the local folder

options.description: export options code (check data, generate code) and quit

filter.description: process only files with :filter in their names

mode.description: determine which set of tests to run

clean.description: clean working folder before running tests

no_quit.description: do not quit testing on first error

logs.description: display smart contract lo(g)s or events

accounting.description: display credits and debits per account and reconcile at each block

no_check.description: do not do balance check at each block

debug.description: enter debug mode (pause after each transaction)

single.description: if debugging is enable, single step through transactions

export.description: export the transactions to export file

json.description: ignore export format and export as json

balances.description: if a balance does not reconcile, export a message to a file

veryRaw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

pair.description: Which price pair to freshen or list (see Poloniex)

quotes.description: Freshen and/or display Ethereum price data and other purposes.

addr_list.description: one or more addresses to slurp

block_list.description: an optional range of blocks to slurp

silent.description: Run silently (only freshen the data, do not display it)

slurp.description: Fetches data from EtherScan for an arbitrary address. Formats the output to your specification.

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

term_list.description: a space separated list of one or more search terms

expand.description: expand search to include all fields (default searches name, address, and symbol only)

owned.description: Include personal accounts in the search

named.description: Include well know token and airdrop addresses in the search

addr.description: display only addresses in the results (useful for scripting)

accounts.description: Query addresses and/or names of well known accounts.

version.description: display the current version of the tool

veryRaw.description: report JSON data from node with zero processing

to_file.description: write the results to a temporary file and return the filename

output.description: write the results to file 'fn' and return the filename

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

block_list.description: a space-separated list of one or more blocks to retrieve

hash_only.description: display only transaction hashes, default is to display full transaction detail

check.description: compare results between qblocks and Ethereum node, report differences, if any

addrs.description: display all addresses included in the block

uniq.description: display only uniq addresses found per block

uniq_tx.description: display only uniq addresses found per transaction

count_only.description: display counts of appearances (for --addrs, --uniq, or --uniq_tx only)

filter.description: useful only for --addrs or --uniq, only display this address in results

report.description: display the latest blocks at both the node and the cache

force.description: force a re-write of the block to the cache

quiet.description: do not print results to screen, used for speed testing and data checking

cache.description: use the cache for data retrieval

normalize.description: normalize (remove un-common fields and sort) for comparison with other results (testing)

blocks.description: Returns block(s) from local cache or directly from a running node.

file.description: specify multiple sets of command line options in a file.

block_list.description: a space-separated list of one or more blocks for which to retrieve blooms

eab.description: pull the enhanced adaptive blooms from QBlocks cache

block_only.description: show only the block-level bloom (--raw only)

receipt_only.description: show only the receipt-level blooms (--raw only)

bits.description: display blooms as bits instead of hex

bars.description: display blooms as bar chart instead of hex

bitbars.description: display nBits as a bar chart

pctbars.description: display nBits as a percentage of bloom space

bitcount.description: display the number of bits lit per bloom

force.description: force a re-write of the bloom to the cache

blooms.description: Returns bloom filter(s) from running node (the default) or as EAB from QBlocks.

addr_list.description: one or more addresses (0x...) from which to retrieve balances

block_list.description: an optional list of one or more blocks at which to report balances, defaults to 'latest'

no_zero.description: suppress the display of zero balance accounts

changes.description: only report a balance when it changes from one block to the next

no_header.description: hide the header in txt and csv mode

no_history.description: for testing only, hide the server's historical state

state.description: Retrieve the balance (in wei) for one or more addresses at the given block(s).

block_list.description: an optional list of one or more blocks at which to report balances, defaults to 'latest'

by_acct.description: consider each address an ERC20 token except the last, whose balance is reported for each token

no_zero.description: suppress the display of zero balance accounts

tokens.description: Retrieve the token balance(s) for one or more addresses at the given (or latest) block(s).

addr_list.description: list of one or more smart contracts whose ABI to grab from EtherScan

canonical.description: convert all types to their canonical represenation and remove all spaces from display

generate.description: generate C++ code into the current folder for all functions and events found in the ABI

encode.description: generate the encodings for the functions / events in the ABI

json.description: print the ABI to the screen as json

noconst.description: generate encodings for non-constant functions and events only (always true when generating)

sol.description: create the ABI file from a .sol file in the local directory

open.description: open the ABI file for editing, download if not already present

silent.description: if ABI cannot be acquired, fail silently (useful for scripting)
